name: Dan's Delivery
description:
Drive around as a delivery vehicle, avoiding obstacles, and delivering pizza!

PRESS AND HOLD the A and D KEYS or the ARROW KEYS to drive around a delivery vehicle and avoid obstacles.

Whenever you see a PINK ZONE, ENTER IT and PRESS the S KEY to gain EXTRA POINTS AND COINS.

Use COINS to buy more vehicles and complete challenges to unlock chests which grant more REWARDS!

I would like any feedback you could give. Thank you!
